label: Folder 32: Ortmann Letter
description: Letter to Frederick H. McDonald from Chris H. Ortmann regarding an invitation to join the Community Development Council (Jan. 25, 1943).

metadata.label: Description
metadata.value: Letter to Frederick H. McDonald from Chris H. Ortmann regarding an invitation to join the Community Development Council (Jan. 25, 1943).

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value: CITY OF Charleston  Police DEPARTMENT  CHRIS.  H.  ORTMANN,  CHIEF   OF   Police  FRED P.   HAMITON,   Hon.  HENRY W.  OCKWOOD,  Mayor  1ST  IEUT.   AND   CHIEF  CERK  JOSEPH  F. wiSE,  CHIEF   DETECTIVE  Charleston, S. C.  Jan.  25,  1943.  Mr. Frederick H. McDonad  Chairman,  Community development Council  Gibbes Art Gallery  Charleston, S.C.  Bear Sir:  I appreciate you extending me an invitation  to be a member of the Advisory Committee on Bequire-  ments for New Personne of the Community development  Council of Charleston, S.C.  I will be gad to serve, but regret to inform  you that I will not be in position to attend the  meeting at the Gibbes Art Gallery at noon on Friday  January 29, 1943 or any other Friday at noon, as I am  a member of the social Protective Associaltion, which,  meets every Friday at noon in the City Ha.  I remain  very truy yours,  Cap"t. Chris. H. Ortmann  Chief of Police.
